facts.fact: Zapier integrates with over 3,000 apps, allowing users to automate workflows without coding.
Zapier's user base includes over 4 million users worldwide, primarily small to medium-sized businesses.
Zapier offers a free tier that allows users to create simple automations with limited features.
Zapier was founded in 2011 and has raised over $1.3 billion in funding.

risks: Market saturation with similar automation tools may dilute brand visibility.
Potential changes in data privacy regulations in the EU and UK could impact operations.
Dependence on third-party app integrations may lead to service disruptions.
